#summary Rough project plan

The plan below outlining the different version are preliminary and will be corrected as the project moves along.

The first few versions will not recive individual tags, but will be denoted with a specific revision id that refers to [https://jakob.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ trunk].

For the latest development, please check out [http://code.google.com/p/jakob/source/checkout trunk].

= Releases = 

Version 0.1: Static rules, administrated via an text editor at WAYF. (trunk [http://code.google.com/p/jakob/source/detail?r=71 r71])

= Future releases = 
Version 0.2: redundans, (som ved BIRK, -> afhængighed til BIRK-projekt)

Version 0.3: statiske regler, administreret via webinterface af IdP'erne

Version 0.4 : Dynamiske regler baseret på svar fra et attribut store.

Version 0.5 : statistik over hvilke attributter der leveres fra hvilke IdP'er og attribut-stores

Version 0.6:  Errorhåndtering: Visning i samtykke-dialog, hvor påkrævede attributter ikke blev leveret fra. Giver afhængighed til samtykkemodul.
